Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
We explore the structure of an content type definition in OpenCms and explain how to create a new content type definition.

  • See here to find out how to make a new content type available as resource type in the ADE frontend.

Teaser.content: We explore the structure of an content type definition in OpenCms and explain how to create a new content type definition.
